item.title: 中国建筑商德信收到香港法院的清盘令
item.description: 一家中国中型开发商在香港的清盘案中败诉，面临法院下令清盘的命运，这使得涉及逾期债务的债权人在法律上获胜的案例越来越多。【原文：A medium-sized Chinese developer faces court-ordered liquidation after losing a winding-up case in Hong Kong, adding to a growing number of legal victories for creditors involving overdue debt.】

item.title: Janus Henderson 押注依然低廉的日本金融股
item.description: Janus Henderson Investors 投资组合经理表示，尽管日本金融公司在过去一年中稳步上涨，但其价值仍被低估，股息支付的增加使其成为一项良好的投资。【原文：Japanese financial firms still look undervalued despite their steady gains in the past year, with rising dividend payments making them a good investment, according to a Janus Henderson Investors portfolio manager.】

item.title: 新加坡加强对家族办公室和对冲基金的审查
item.description: 新加坡当局要求家族办公室和对冲基金提供更多信息，同时在一连串丑闻凸显出这个金融中心的监管漏洞之后，加紧关闭处于休眠状态的公司。【原文：Singapore authorities are demanding more information from family offices and hedge funds while stepping up closures of dormant firms after a string of scandals highlighted cracks in the financial hub’s oversight.】

item.title: 大和证券将从激进基金手中收购青空银行股份
item.description: 大和证券集团（Daiwa Securities Group Inc.【原文：Daiwa Securities Group Inc. said it has agreed to buy a stake in Aozora Bank Ltd. from a fund with ties to Japan’s most prominent activist.】

item.title: 交易商等待欧佩克对市场的展望，原油延续涨势
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）的报告将为市场前景提供一个缩影，在该报告公布之前，原油大幅走高，创下自 3 月份以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Oil pushed higher, following its biggest jump since March, ahead of an OPEC report that will provide a snapshot on the market outlook.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好华尔街警告股市将出现震荡。债券交易员为美国利率长期走高做好准备。苹果公司首次推出新工具。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Wall Street warns of a stock market jolt. Bond traders brace for higher-for-longer US interest rates. Apple debuts new tools. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 谢因鲍姆支持司法改革，墨西哥比索下挫
item.description: 墨西哥当选总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆表示，国会将首先讨论一项关于国家司法系统的改革提案，投资者担心这将削弱对执政党的制约，墨西哥比索因此下挫。【原文：Mexico’s peso sank after President-elect Claudia Sheinbaum said a proposed reform of the nation’s judicial system would be among the first to be discussed in congress, spooking investors who worry it will erode checks on the ruling party.】

item.title: 贝恩出价 12 亿美元收购澳大利亚汽车配件商店 Bapcor
item.description: 私募股权公司贝恩资本（Bain Capital）主动向澳大利亚汽车零部件零售商 Bapcor Ltd 发出收购要约，对该公司的估值超过 18.3 亿澳元（12.1 亿美元）。【原文：Private equity firm Bain Capital has made an unsolicited takeover offer for Australian automotive parts retailer Bapcor Ltd that values the business at more than A$1.83 billion ($1.21 billion).】

item.title: 岩石坍塌的持续影响影响了 Codelco 公司的铜产量
item.description: 世界第一大铜供应商 Codelco 正努力扭转产量下滑的局面，该公司将其顶级矿山产量的大幅下降归因于去年岩石坍塌造成的持续影响。【原文：Codelco attributed a sharp drop in production at its top mine to the lingering effects of a rock collapse last year as the world’s No. 1 copper supplier strives to reverse slumping output.】

item.title: 美国关键指标公布前，亚洲股市涨跌不一：市场综述
item.description: 继华尔街股市低迷之后，周二亚洲期货市场股市涨跌不一，投资者正在为本周的美联储决议和关键的通胀数据做准备。【原文：Asian futures pointed to mixed equity trading on Tuesday, following a subdued session on Wall Street as investors position for this week’s Federal Reserve decision and key inflation data.】

item.title: 赫兹股份持有人要求支付 1.88 亿美元控制权变更费
item.description: 赫兹全球控股公司（Hertz Global Holdings Inc.【原文：Some holders of Hertz Global Holdings Inc. warrants are demanding a payout of about five times the current stock price, arguing the company’s debt issuance and share buybacks triggered a change of control event, according to a letter their lawyer sent to the company.】

item.title: 比尔-格罗斯称欧洲债券更具吸引力
item.description: 比尔-格罗斯（Bill Gross）正在欧洲寻找机会，因为该地区出人意料的大选结果令市场哗然，并使法国债券收益率达到今年以来的最高点。【原文：Bill Gross is finding opportunities in Europe after surprising election results in the region rattled markets and sent French bond yields to their highest mark this year.】

item.title: 参议员称市场是墨西哥国会下一步行动的一个因素
item.description: 墨西哥参议院多数党领袖里卡多-蒙雷亚尔（Ricardo Monreal）在接受采访时说，墨西哥执政党在讨论宪法改革时将牢记市场。【原文：Mexico’s ruling party will keep the market in mind as it moves to discuss constitutional reforms, Senate Majority Leader Ricardo Monreal said in an interview.】

item.title: 债券交易员将跟随美联储的新政策一路走到 2025 年
item.description: 债券交易员们已经接受了 2024 年之前利率将长期维持较高水平的前景，他们正期待着本周的美联储会议为 2025 年及以后如何博弈提供线索。【原文：Bond traders who have come to terms with the prospect of higher-for-longer interest rates through 2024 are looking toward this week’s Federal Reserve meeting for clues on how to game out 2025 and beyond.】

item.title: 丰业银行因两位分析师兄弟离职而撤销对 37 只股票的报道
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，随着担任股票分析师的两兄弟相继离职，丰业银行在一天之内放弃了对 37 只股票的研究覆盖。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia dropped research coverage of 37 stocks in a single day as two brothers who both worked as equity analysts exited the firm, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国银行称，更高的票息支付使信贷需求居高不下
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师表示，企业债券投资者发现，在利率自 2022 年以来持续上升之后，他们的利息收入正在跃升，而当他们将这些资金再投资于投资级信贷市场时，估值会保持在相对较高的水平。【原文：Corporate bond investors are finding that their interest income is jumping after rates have been rising since 2022, and as they reinvest that money in the investment-grade credit market, valuations can stay relatively high, according to strategists at Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 加纳塞地因美元进口需求减弱至历史最低点
item.description: 在公司增加对美元的需求，以引进燃料、药品和其他快速消费品之后，加纳的塞地贬值到了历史最低点。【原文：Ghana’s cedi weakened to a record low after companies increased demand for dollars to bring in fuel, pharmaceuticals and other fast moving consumer goods.】

item.title: 零息债券规模激增至接近 5 亿美元
item.description: 由于美国最大的养老基金可能会抢购更多的长期债务，5 月份未偿还的零息国债金额上升到近 5 万亿美元的新高。【原文：The amount of zero-coupon Treasury bonds outstanding rose in May to a new high of nearly half a trillion dollars as the biggest US pension funds likely snapped up more long-term debt.】

item.title: 拉丁美洲的 "祖国 "希望从沙特王储的愿景中分一杯羹
item.description: 拉丁美洲最大的另类资产管理公司之一 Patria Investments Ltd. 正与其投资组合公司合作，增加对沙特阿拉伯的投资，以深化与这个石油资源丰富的王国的关系。【原文：Patria Investments Ltd., one of the largest alternative asset managers in Latin America, is working with its portfolio companies to boost investment into Saudi Arabia as it looks to deepen relations with the oil-rich kingdom.】

item.title: 曼钦支持的天然气管道寻求美国批准启动
item.description: 山谷管道公司正在请求监管机构允许其在完成这一备受争议的项目后开始运营。【原文：The Mountain Valley Pipeline is asking regulators for permission to begin operating after finishing the controversial project.】

item.title: 阿布扎比塔卡公司和 Criteria 公司放弃 260 亿美元收购西班牙公用事业公司的谈判
item.description: 阿布扎比国家能源公司（Abu Dhabi National Energy Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi National Energy Co. and Criteria Caixa SA have ended talks to jointly take over a €24 billion ($26 billion) Spanish utility.】

item.title: 对冲基金抢购软件，芯片股黯然失色
item.description: 对冲基金上周大举抛售人工智能热潮的受益者半导体股票，同时抢购软件。【原文：Hedge funds made an about-face last week dumping semiconductor stocks — beneficiaries of the artificial intelligence boom — while snatching up software.】

item.title: 欧洲就保持俄乌天然气管道畅通进行谈判
item.description: 欧洲官员正在进行谈判，以保持天然气通过一条关键的俄罗斯-乌克兰输气管道，因为他们正竭力防止莫斯科的战争进一步破坏欧洲大陆的能源供应。【原文：European officials are in talks to keep gas flowing through a key Russia-Ukraine pipeline, as they race to prevent Moscow’s war further damaging the continent’s energy supplies.】

item.title: 据说 StubHub 在计划 IPO 之前的 Ebitda 为 3.5 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，StubHub 在截至 3 月份的一年中，未计利息、税项、折旧及摊销前的利润为 3.5 亿美元，这家票务销售商正在为计划中的美国首次公开募股做准备。【原文：StubHub had $350 million in earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization for the year ending in March, as the ticket seller prepares for a planned US initial public offering, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特斯拉长期股东 Baillie Gifford 支持马斯克支付 560 亿美元薪酬
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，特斯拉公司最长期的股东之一、苏格兰资产管理公司 Baillie Gifford 将对埃隆-马斯克 560 亿美元的薪酬方案投赞成票。【原文：One of Tesla Inc.’s longest-standing holders, Scottish asset manager Baillie Gifford, will vote in favor of Elon Musk’s $56 billion pay package, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 主要能源投资者称，除非钻机数量增加，否则明年美国石油产量将下降
item.description: 一位重要的能源投资者表示，除非钻机数量增加，否则到2025年下半年，美国的石油日产量将下降约100万桶。【原文：US oil production is set to decline about 1 million barrels per day by the second half of 2025 unless rig counts rise, a key energy investor said.】

item.title: Glencore 取代 Trafigura 成为英国重要炼油厂的供应商
item.description: 大宗商品贸易商嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc.【原文：Commodity trader Glencore Plc. will replace its rival Trafigura Group as the supplier of crude oil to a key refinery in the UK.】

item.title: Textainer 正在洽谈以 50 亿美元收购海航旗下 Seaco 公司的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Stonepeak 旗下的 Textainer 正在就从倒闭的中国企业集团海航集团旗下的一家公司收购集装箱租赁公司 Seaco 进行深入谈判。【原文：Stonepeak-owned Textainer is in advanced talks to acquire container leasing firm Seaco from an arm of failed Chinese conglomerate HNA Group, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行降息不会使利率进入 "直线下降通道
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲央行必须保持谨慎，上周下调借贷成本后不一定会有进一步的快速举措。【原文：The European Central Bank must stay cautious, and last week’s cut in borrowing costs won’t necessarily be followed by further rapid moves, according to President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 以太投资产品迎来 3 月以来最大单周流入量
item.description: 根据 CoinShares International Ltd. 的数据，美国证券交易委员会允许以太币交易所交易基金的意外决定可能导致持有第二大加密货币的投资产品创下数月来最大单周流入量。【原文：A surprise decision from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to allow Ether exchange-traded funds likely led to the largest weekly inflows in months into investment products holding the second-largest cryptocurrency, according to CoinShares International Ltd.】
